tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE police_misconduct_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  officer_name VARCHAR(50),
  incident_date DATE,
  misconduct_type VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE police_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    officer_name VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE,
    department VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE accountability_measures (
    measure_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    measure_name VARCHAR(50),
    measure_date DATE,
    department VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE police_officers ( officer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, officer_name VARCHAR, badge_number INT, department VARCHAR, hire_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE misconduct_reports ( report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, officer_id UUID REFERENCES police_officers(officer_id), report_date DATE, report_description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE accountability_measures ( measure_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, officer_id UUID REFERENCES police_officers(officer_id), measure_type VARCHAR, measure_date DATE );

CREATE TABLE misconduct_reports (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	officer_id INT,
	report_date DATE,
	misconduct_type VARCHAR,
	severity VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE investigation_teams (
	team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	team_lead VARCHAR,
	case_id INT,
	team_member1 VARCHAR,
	team_member2 VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE police_department (
	police_department_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	police_department_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	city TEXT NOT NULL,
	state TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE officer (
	officer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	officer_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	officer_badge_number TEXT NOT NULL,
	officer_rank TEXT NOT NULL,
	date_joined DATE
)

CREATE TABLE complaint (
	complaint_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	complainant_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	complaint_date DATE NOT NULL,
	complaint_description TEXT NOT NULL,
	status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident (
	incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	incident_date DATE NOT NULL,
	location TEXT NOT NULL,
	description TEXT NOT NULL,
	status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investigation (
	investigation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	complaint_id UUID NOT NULL,
	investigating_officer_id UUID NOT NULL,
	incident_id UUID NOT NULL,
	status TEXT
)
